revision.text:
'''Teams''' are competing groups of [[player]]s in [[multiplayer]] gamemodes. A team is defined through the [[TEAMINFO]] lump. [[ZDoom]] only features one team-based game mode, team [[deathmatch]], but [[Skulltag]] features many more. [[DM flag]]s and [[gameplay options]] allow to tweak many parts of team play. A dedicated [[console command]], <tt>say_team</tt>, allows to send a [[message]] to all members of the same team.
[[Spying]], if allowed, is only possible in [[cooperative]] mode or on other members of your team (unless watching a [[demo]]). [[Category:Features]][[Category:Glossary]]
